mapper.update: UPDATE `course_apply_info` cai SET cai.`is_delete` = 1, cai.`update_time` = NOW() WHERE cai.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT cai.id id, cai.img_path imgPath, cai.title, (cai.`price`*10) price, cai.`course_number` courseNumber, oc.`is_recommend` recommend, cai.`multimedia_type` multimediaType, cai.`status` applyStatus, oc.`status` , cai.`last_update_time` lastUpdateTime FROM `course_apply_info` cai LEFT JOIN `oe_course` oc ON cai.`id` = oc.`apply_id` WHERE cai.`user_id` = #{userId} AND cai.is_delete=0 AND cai.`collection` = 1 AND cai.`course_form` = 2
AND cai.`multimedia_type` = #{multimediaType}
AND cai.`title` like concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY cai.`create_time` DESC

SELECT cai.id id, cai.img_path imgPath, cai.title, cai.`course_length` courseLength, cai.`start_time` startTime, oc.live_status liveStatus, oc.direct_id webinarId FROM `course_apply_info` cai JOIN `oe_course` oc ON cai.`id` = oc.`apply_id` WHERE cai.`user_id` = #{userId} AND cai.`course_form` = 1
AND cai.`title` concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY cai.`create_time` DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT '礼物' AS changeType, oc.`grade_name` AS goods, TRUNCATE(uci.value, 2) AS VALUE, uci.`create_time` FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_gift_statement` ogs ON ogs.id = uci.order_no_gift JOIN `oe_course` oc ON ogs.`live_id` = oc.`id` WHERE uci.`change_type` = 3 AND uci.`user_id` = #{userId} UNION all SELECT '课程销售' AS changeType, oc.`grade_name` AS goods, TRUNCATE(uci.value, 2) AS VALUE, uci.`create_time` FROM `user_coin_increase` uci JOIN `oe_order_detail` ood ON ood.`id` = uci.`order_no_course` JOIN `oe_course` oc ON ood.`course_id` = oc.`id` WHERE uci.`change_type` = 7 AND uci.`user_id` = #{userId} UNION all SELECT '结算' AS changeType, '结算' AS goods, TRUNCATE(ucc.value, 2) AS VALUE, ucc.`create_time` FROM `user_coin_consumption` ucc WHERE ucc.`change_type` = 5 AND ucc.`user_id` = #{userId} ) uccuci ORDER BY uccuci.create_time DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ucc.`value`, '提现' AS changeType, ucc.`create_time` createTime, '银行卡' AS form, oubc.`acct_pan` acctPan, eai.`status`, eai.`dismissal`, eai.`dismissal_remark` dismissalRemark FROM `user_coin_consumption` ucc JOIN `enchashment_apply_info` eai ON ucc.`order_no_enchashment` = eai.`id` JOIN `oe_user_bank_card` oubc ON eai.`bank_card_id` = oubc.`id` WHERE ucc.`change_type` = 6 AND ucc.`user_id`=#{userId} UNION all SELECT uci.`value`, '提现驳回' AS changeType, uci.`create_time` createTime, NULL AS form, NULL AS acctPan, NULL AS `status`, NULL AS `dismissal`, NULL AS dismissalRemark FROM `user_coin_increase` uci WHERE uci.`change_type` = 5 AND uci.`user_id`=#{userId} UNION all SELECT uci.`value`, '结算' AS changeType, uci.`create_time` createTime, NULL AS form, NULL AS acctPan, NULL AS `status`, NULL AS `dismissal`, NULL AS dismissalRemark FROM `user_coin_increase` uci WHERE uci.`change_type` = 6 AND uci.`user_id`=#{userId} ) uccuci ORDER BY uccuci.createTime DESC

SELECT cai.`id`, cai.`title`, cai.lecturer, (cai.`price`*10) price FROM `course_apply_info` cai WHERE cai.`collection` = 0 AND cai.`is_delete` = 0 AND cai.`user_id` = #{userId} AND cai.`multimedia_type` =#{multimediaType}

SELECT cai.id, cai.title, cai.subtitle, cai.user_id, cai.img_path, cai.lecturer, cai.lecturer_description, cai.course_form, cai.course_menu, cai.start_time, cai.end_time, cai.city, cai.address, cai.course_length, cai.price * 10 AS price, cai.password, cai.course_description, cai.course_detail, cai.course_outline, cai.course_resource, cai.course_number, cai.multimedia_type, cai.collection, cai.sale, cai.status, cai.dismissal, cai.dismissal_remark, cai.review_person, cai.review_time, cai.create_time, cai.update_time, cai.resource_id, cai.city, cai.old_apply_info_id FROM `course_apply_info` cai WHERE cai.`is_delete` = 0 AND cai.`user_id` = #{userId} AND cai.`id`=#{caiId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `course_apply_info` cai WHERE cai.`is_delete` = 0 AND cai.`title`=#{title}
AND cai.`id` != #{oldApplyInfoId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `oe_course` oc WHERE oc.`is_delete` = 0 AND oc.`grade_name` = #{title}

SELECT cai.`id`, cai.`title`, cai.`lecturer`, (cai.`price`*10) price, cca.collection_course_sort FROM `course_apply_info` cai JOIN `collection_course_apply` cca ON cai.id = cca.`course_apply_id` WHERE cca.`collection_apply_id` = #{id} ORDER BY cca.`collection_course_sort`

SELECT cai.title FROM `collection_course_apply` cca JOIN `course_apply_info` cai ON cca.`collection_apply_id` = cai.id AND cai.`status`=2 AND cai.`is_delete`=0 AND cca.`course_apply_id`=#{id} GROUP BY cai.id
